definition: to lower/to decrease/to reduce/to subtract/to diminish
see 壓根兒|压根儿[ya4 gen1 r5]
to press/to push down/to keep under (control)/pressure
decompression schedule (diving)/also called 減壓程序|减压程序[jian3 ya1 cheng2 xu4]
decompression sickness/the bends/also 減壓症|减压症[jian3 ya1 zheng4]
decompression sickness/the bends/also 減壓病|减压病[jian3 ya1 bing4]

sentences.english: Conclusion The above procedure is necessary for the ankle sprains with the injury of the common peroneal nerve.
sentences.chinese: 結論踝扭傷出現腓總神經損傷者應作探查鬆解減壓術。

sentences.english: With an asynchronous model, the queue itself acts as a relief valve.
sentences.chinese: 藉助異步模型，隊列本身可以充當一個減壓閥。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the validity of decompressive hemicraniectomy of massive cerebral infarction.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討去骨辨減壓術治療大面積腦梗死的有效性。

sentences.english: In real life there has been just one fatal space depressurisation accident.
sentences.chinese: 在現實生活中只有一起致命的太空爆發性減壓事故。

sentences.english: The patient underwent external decompression and external ventricular drainage.
sentences.chinese: 患者接受了外部減壓和腦室外引流。

sentences.english: All pressure-relief devices should be piped to safe areas, preferably outdoors.
sentences.chinese: 所有減壓裝置都要通到安全區域，最好是室外。

sentences.english: It can block and relieve forenamed variety by disbranching vagus nerve and depressor nerve.
sentences.chinese: 切斷迷走神經和減壓神經可以阻斷或減輕上述變化。

sentences.english: X-ray CT images were obtained with contrast, before and after decompressive surgery.
sentences.chinese: 減壓術前及術後均進行X線CT增強掃描。

sentences.english: The PORV' backup valve is opened to lower the pressure.
sentences.chinese: 減壓閥的備用閥門被打開，減少壓力。

sentences.english: But why are schools taking on the responsibility of teaching stress-reducers?
sentences.chinese: 但是爲什麼要讓學校來負責爲學生減壓呢？

sentences.english: Steam and water continues to be released through the PORV, creating a LOCA (loss of coolant accident).
sentences.chinese: 蒸汽和水通過減壓閥持續釋放，造成失水事故。

sentences.english: Use a pressure-reducing regulator or separate control valve to discharge gas from cylinder.
sentences.chinese: 使用減壓調整器或單獨的控制閥來從鋼瓶中提取氣體。

sentences.english: Only by incision of the perineurium the nerve fibres can be completely decompressed.
sentences.chinese: 因此只有切開束膜，神經纖維才能獲得完全減壓。

sentences.english: In chapter 4, the principle drawing of the system is presented after adding a constant-pressure-drop valve.
sentences.chinese: 第四章，給出了系統中加定差減壓閥後的結構原理圖。

sentences.english: She means decompression sickness, or the bends.
sentences.chinese: 其實她所說的應該是減壓病。

sentences.english: Valves are direct acting and pilot-type two kinds.
sentences.chinese: 減壓閥有直動型和先導型兩種。

definition: to be capable of/to be able to/can
to ease (tension)/to relax/to cause sth to relax/to alleviate/relaxed/easy and unhurried/leisurely/soothing/mild (slope)
to toughen/to temper/to engage in physical exercise/to work out/(fig.) to develop one's skills/to train oneself
to release/to set free/to liberate (a prisoner)/to discharge
to adapt (to an environment etc)/to make sth suitable/adaptation/adjustment/adaptive
